timeline.bodyText: We're going to have multiple region tag source in DRIFT if we have multiple files that have the same tag. Do we need it in multiple places?

timeline.bodyText: Do we expect users to copy and paste this class? Why are there multiple copies of this class in the samples rather than just one copy?

replies.bodyText: Ideally we'd move them into a separate package in the central Maven repo - but copying is the only way to avoid "sibling dependencies" for now (unless we somehow put them in the parent package, which I'm not sure Maven supports).
replies.author: ace-n

timeline.message: Delete pom.xml that got merged back in
